trans-unit.target: Base Camp Beta Preparations<tab>The time is come! We are presently gathering materials to expand the Moongate Hub!<tab>Searchingway
Base Camp Beta Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the Moongate Hub's expansion. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Base Camp Beta Construction<tab>The expansion of the Moongate Hub is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Base Camp Beta Complete<tab>The Moongate Hub now boasts a few helpful upgrades. We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Central Radius Preparations<tab>Why travel on foot when we can build a Cosmoliner circuit here at the hub? To that end, we are presently gathering materials!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Central Radius Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the Cosmoliner's construction. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Central Radius Construction<tab>The construction of the Cosmoliner is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Central Radius Complete<tab>Now that the Cosmoliner is complete, sore feet will soon be a thing of the past. We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Habitation Module & Cosmoport Preparations<tab>A proper hub needs a habitation module and a cosmoport for starships. To that end, we are presently gathering materials!<tab>Searchingway
Habitation Module Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the habitation module's construction. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Habitation Module Construction<tab>The construction of the habitation module is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoport Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the cosmoport's construction. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoport Construction<tab>The construction of the cosmoport is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Habitation Module & Cosmoport Complete<tab>The habitation module and cosmoport are both ready for occupants. We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Beta Preparations<tab>Reportedly, the mech hangar is due for an upgrade. To that end, we are presently gathering materials!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Beta Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the mech hangar's renovation. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Beta Construction<tab>The renovation of the mech hangar is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Beta Complete<tab>The mech hangar has now received a much-needed upgrade. We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Northwestern Radius Preparations<tab>It's time we extended the Cosmoliner into the northwest. To that end, we are presently gathering materials!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Northwestern Radius Construction<tab>The northwestern extension of the Cosmoliner is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Northwestern Radius Complete<tab>Calabash Cove is now just a short hop away! We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Southeastern Radius Preparations<tab>Next, we'll extend the Cosmoliner into the southeast. To that end, we are presently gathering materials!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Southeastern Radius Construction<tab>The southeastern extension of the Cosmoliner is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Southeastern Radius Complete<tab>The Cosmoliner now stretches as far as Weddingway's Bower! We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Piercingway Tunnel Preparations<tab>For various reasons, we've decided to carve a tunnel into Gleamslope. To that end, we are presently gathering materials!<tab>Searchingway
Piercingway Tunnel Preliminary Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the preliminary stage of tunnel excavation. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Piercingway Tunnel Preliminary Construction<tab>The preliminary stage of tunnel excavation is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Piercingway Tunnel Final Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the final stage of tunnel excavation. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Piercingway Tunnel Final Construction<tab>The final stage of tunnel excavation is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Piercingway Tunnel Complete<tab>At last, we can get a good look inside Gleamslope! We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Southwestern Radius Preparations<tab>Let's extend the Cosmoliner into our brand new Piercingway Tunnel. Presently gathering materials for construction!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Southwestern Radius Construction<tab>The southwestern extension of the Cosmoliner is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Southwestern Radius Complete<tab>With this Cosmoliner extension, exploring Gleamslope is easier than ever. We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Base Camp Gamma Preparations<tab>The Moongate Hub could stand to be a sight bigger, don't you think? Presently gathering materials for another expansion!<tab>Searchingway
Base Camp Gamma Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the Moongate Hub's expansion. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Base Camp Gamma Construction<tab>The expansion of the Moongate Hub is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Base Camp Gamma Complete<tab>The Moongate Hub is officially bigger and better than ever. We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway

Energization Station & Hydrofication Station Preparations<tab>What the hub needs now is proper infrastructure: to wit, energization and hydrofication stations. Presently gathering materials for construction!<tab>Searchingway
Energization Station Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the energization station's construction. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Energization Station Construction<tab>The construction of the energization station is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Hydrofication Station Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the hydrofication station's construction. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Hydrofication Station Construction<tab>The construction of the hydrofication station is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway

Energization Station & Hydrofication Station Complete<tab>With power and water at our command, the Moongate Hub is now entirely self-sufficient! We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Gamma & Cosmoport Beta Preparations<tab>As of late, the mech hangar and cosmoport are in desperate need of upgrades. To that end, we are presently gathering materials!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Gamma Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the mech hangar's renovation. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Gamma Construction<tab>The renovation of the mech hangar is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoport Beta Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the cosmoport's renovation. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoport Beta Construction<tab>The renovation of the cosmoport is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Mech Hangar Gamma & Cosmoport Beta Complete<tab>Both the mech hangar and cosmoport have been outfitted with state-of-the-art upgrades. We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Nadir Lift Preparations<tab>Without a lift, we've no means of exploring the lunar nadir─so we'll simply have to build one! Presently gathering materials for construction!<tab>Searchingway
Nadir Lift Preliminary Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the preliminary stage of nadir lift construction. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Nadir Lift Preliminary Construction<tab>The preliminary construction of the nadir lift is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Nadir Lift Final Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the final stage of nadir lift construction. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Nadir Lift Final Construction<tab>The final stage of nadir lift construction is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Nadir Lift Complete<tab>At last, we'll discover what lurks within the lunar nadir! We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Subterranean Radius Preparations<tab>The Cosmoliner could do with one last extension: into the lunar nadir! Presently gathering materials for construction!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Subterranean Radius Construction<tab>The subterranean extension of the Cosmoliner is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Cosmoliner Subterranean Radius Complete<tab>With the Cosmoliner now fully extended, we can travel freely to every last corner of Sinus Ardorum! We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway

Lunar Hopopolis Preparations<tab>Seeing as we now have the population of a small village, it's time our hub looked the part! Presently gathering materials for a truly stellar expansion!<tab>Searchingway
Lunar Hopopolis Groundwork<tab>Projects are currently being scheduled for the Moongate Hub's final expansion. We hope you will join our efforts!<tab>Searchingway
Lunar Hopopolis Construction<tab>The final expansion of the Moongate Hub is now underway! Come and lend a paw!<tab>Searchingway
Lunar Hopopolis Complete<tab>I present to you our interstellar port town: Lunar Hopopolis, home of the cosmic explorers! We thank you all for your cooperation!<tab>Searchingway

Lunar Development Initiative Complete<tab>Owing to myriad contributions by artisans like you, we have achieved every last objective outlined for Sinus Ardorum. You've made my dream come true!<tab>Searchingway
